amendment.description: Amendment requires a report on the economic impacts of the bill including an estimate on expected increases in recreational hunting, fishing, shooting, and conservation activities; an estimate of jobs created to support such activities; an estimate of wages related to these jobs; and an estimate of anticipated new local, State, and Federal revenues.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 113-339 to require a report on economic impacts of the Act. The report would include any expected increases in recreational hunting, fishing, shooting, and conservation activities; an estimate of jobs created to support such activities; an estimate of wages related to these jobs; and estimate of anticipated new local, State, and Federal revenue.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hanna amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
